name: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
description:
This game is a casual VR game. Players control the roller coaster to browse different scenery in the game.

The usual familiar office, a different perspective. Maybe a different discovery.


In the cyberpunk city, experience different visual sensations.


Quickly experience the fashion scene of New York.


Instructions:
The left handle can interact with the UI, the menu key calls out the menu, and the trigger key confirms;
The right handle touchpad controls acceleration, and the lower controls deceleration.
